name: Take a Chance (Royal Mirrorball Mix)
lyric:
11. Take a Chance - Royal Mirrorball Mix (听见英文版)

作词／作曲 Lyrics／Music：陈忠义Justin Chen
编曲 Arrange：松井宽

Take a chance
to free yourself from the chains
Take a chance
to share the dreams by your hands
Take a chance
to make the world understand
Take a chance
we know this love never ends
Take a chance
Take a chance

I'm driving far away from you
across the bridges all the same
Wanna take a break
Life is so cliche
I'm waiting for someone to take me away

I'm throwing all my stuff away
Let go the memories that we shared
No more apology
Life is ours to seek
Reboot your heart
back to never never land


制作人 Producer：陈忠义 Justin Chen　
录音师／录音室Recording Engineer／Studio：陈忠义＠Inspire Studio
混音师／混音录音室：Masahiro "Gutti" Kawaguchi＠UNIVERSOUL 999 Studio TOKYO

Justin：万分荣幸能够和松井宽老师合作，他是Misia御用编曲，代表作品是Misia每场演唱会必唱曲Into the Light。松井老师是我的良师益友，在人生和音乐上都是。
Sophia：和自己崇拜的音乐人合作，是一件非常令人雀跃的事，也是每个歌手的梦想吧！曾经在Misia的演唱会上与万人一起大合唱Into the light，没想到有一天自己的声音会和松井宽老师的编曲结合在一起，真是太High了！
